Great! I successfully logged in with the correct credentials (Admin123!). Now I need to navigate to a specific project to see the tasks view with the TanStack Table. I can see there are multiple projects listed. I should click on one of them to navigate to the project details and then check the tasks tab.

Let me click on the first project "Cox's Bazar Beach Resort" to navigate to its detail view.
